derivation: or לָשֹׁן; also (in plural) feminine לְשֹׁנָה; from H3960 (לָשַׁן);
strongs_def: the tongue (of man or animals), used literally (as the instrument of licking, eating, or speech), and figuratively (speech, an ingot, a fork of flame, a cove of water)
kjv_def: [phrase] babbler, bay, [phrase] evil speaker, language, talker, tongue, wedge.
